title: New: Father Sculptor – Frances
content:
What is it with Scottish bands and writing unbelievably epic anthems? The Twilight Sad, Idlewild and Frightened Rabbit spring to mind immediately, and even Snow Patrol and Franz Ferdinand dig the occasional festival hit out of their lockers.

Glasgow’s Father Sculptor appear to be continuing in that very vein, with this despairingly open new track Frances, launching straight into the shoegaze inspired riffs and bellowing vocals from the word go. Coming it at over five minutes, Frances is a musical explosion, and boy is it beautiful.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
